name: Torture Chamber
longDesc: You've enetered a room full of gruesome metal implements- the particualrs of their use fortunately obscured by years of age and rust. It's clear that the purpose of this room was not to welcome honored guests.
shortDesc: You are now in a room full of gruseome implements of torture.

shelves.name: Rusted Chest
shelves.desc: You spot a half-rotted chest with rusted hardward- better not to think about what sort of things it once held.

shelves.name: The Tub
shelves.desc: You gag as you notice the huge, wooden tub in the center of the room that smells of decay.  You remember reading about this medieval torture device while researching this castle.

doors.name: Blood-stained arch
doors.desc: You look back the stone archway to the south that bears disturbing stains of a dark brownish red.
